title: After setbacks, Iran sees Lebanon cease-fire as chance to regroup
content: Iran has said that the halt in fighting is a victory for Hezbollah. But behind the scenes, officials worked quietly for a cease-fire to stem the group’s losses.
summary: Iran has said that the halt in fighting is a victory for Hezbollah. But behind the scenes, officials worked quietly for a cease-fire to stem the group’s losses.

title: Live briefing: Israeli strikes continue amid cease-fire deal with Hezbollah
content: The IDF said it conducted a strike on military infrastructure sites near the border crossings between Lebanon and Syria, calling it a response to cease-fire violations.
summary: The IDF said it conducted a strike on military infrastructure sites near the border crossings between Lebanon and Syria, calling it a response to cease-fire violations.

title: IDF strikes aid workers, says one was involved in Oct. 7 attack
Canada’s Trudeau meets with Trump at Mar-a-Lago after tariff threat
content: The sudden visit to Florida by the Canadian leader came days after Trump threatened to impose a 25 percent tariff on Canadian and Mexican goods.
summary: The sudden visit to Florida by the Canadian leader came days after Trump threatened to impose a 25 percent tariff on Canadian and Mexican goods.

title: 3 crushed to death at bakery amid growing hunger crisis in Gaza
Hezbollah chief claims victory in first remarks since cease-fire
A changed Georgia is no longer a haven for Russia’s political exiles
content: Russian political exiles once felt safe in Georgia, but the country has been cracking down on its own civil society and expelling anti-Kremlin dissidents.
summary: Russian political exiles once felt safe in Georgia, but the country has been cracking down on its own civil society and expelling anti-Kremlin dissidents.

title: What Putin’s nuclear-capable Oreshnik missile means for NATO security
content: The Russian leader’s use of the missile against Ukraine sends a powerful signal about his intention to weaken NATO and bend Europe’s security architecture to Russia’s will.
summary: The Russian leader’s use of the missile against Ukraine sends a powerful signal about his intention to weaken NATO and bend Europe’s security architecture to Russia’s will.

title: Israel-Hezbollah cease-fire appears to hold amid violation accusations
content: The Lebanese army said Israel violated the cease-fire agreement, while the IDF said it was responding to violations by Hezbollah.
summary: The Lebanese army said Israel violated the cease-fire agreement, while the IDF said it was responding to violations by Hezbollah.

title: Syrian rebels breach Aleppo, Syria’s largest city, in startling advance
content: The lightning assault on Aleppo by the Islamist militant group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham abruptly redrew the front lines of Syria’s civil war.
summary: The lightning assault on Aleppo by the Islamist militant group Hayat Tahrir al-Sham abruptly redrew the front lines of Syria’s civil war.

title: Hezbollah chief claims victory in first remarks since cease-fire
At least 75 dead in northern Gaza attacks, officials say
Restored Notre Dame unveiled with grand tour led by Macron
content: The televised tour is the first look inside the revamped cathedral since the 2019 fire that put it at risk of collapse.
summary: The televised tour is the first look inside the revamped cathedral since the 2019 fire that put it at risk of collapse.

title: U.K. backs assisted-dying law after emotional debate over end-of-life care
content: The bill, modeled after Oregon’s law, would apply to terminally ill patients and could usher in one of the most dramatic social changes Britain has seen in years.
summary: The bill, modeled after Oregon’s law, would apply to terminally ill patients and could usher in one of the most dramatic social changes Britain has seen in years.

title: Mexico shuts watchdog agencies, intensifying fears for its democracy
content: President Claudia Sheinbaum says the agencies were unnecessary. Critics call their dissolution a power grab by the ruling party.
summary: President Claudia Sheinbaum says the agencies were unnecessary. Critics call their dissolution a power grab by the ruling party.

title: Could you feed yourself on $70 a month? Chinese millennials are trying.
content: The cost of living is weighing on consumers everywhere. But some Chinese, worried about making ends meet in a slowing economy, are taking this food-spending challenge.
summary: The cost of living is weighing on consumers everywhere. But some Chinese, worried about making ends meet in a slowing economy, are taking this food-spending challenge.

title: After Lebanon cease-fire, Israeli families hope for hostage deal
Chinese journalist and former Harvard fellow sentenced to 7 years
content: Dong Yuyu’s conviction on espionage charges shows how the space for independent thought and open discussion in China has narrowed since Xi Jinping took power in 2012.
summary: Dong Yuyu’s conviction on espionage charges shows how the space for independent thought and open discussion in China has narrowed since Xi Jinping took power in 2012.

title: Can you stop a teen from using TikTok? Australia is about to find out.
content: Australia passed a law banning children under 16 from using social media apps like TikTok and Snapchat. Whether it can be enforced remains in question.
summary: Australia passed a law banning children under 16 from using social media apps like TikTok and Snapchat. Whether it can be enforced remains in question.

title: Mexico’s president has ‘excellent’ talk with Trump, dismisses tariff threat
content: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum spoke to President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs and she hinted at retaliation in a letter.
summary: Mexican President Claudia Sheinbaum spoke to President-elect Donald Trump after he threatened to impose tariffs and she hinted at retaliation in a letter.

title: Russia rains missiles on Ukraine after Trump names new envoy to conflict
content: There was a cautious note of optimism among some Ukrainians for retired Gen. Keith Kellogg’s past supportive remarks for Ukraine to defend itself.
summary: There was a cautious note of optimism among some Ukrainians for retired Gen. Keith Kellogg’s past supportive remarks for Ukraine to defend itself.

title: After Lebanon cease-fire, Israeli families hope for hostage deal
content: Hostage families are pushing the Biden administration and the Trump transition team to help secure the release of their loved ones.
summary: Hostage families are pushing the Biden administration and the Trump transition team to help secure the release of their loved ones.

title: Rare footprints suggest two of our prehistoric ancestors may have met
content: The footprints are the first clear evidence that the two hominin species shared a habitat, raising questions about whether their interactions shaped human evolution.
summary: The footprints are the first clear evidence that the two hominin species shared a habitat, raising questions about whether their interactions shaped human evolution.
